L2_gloss: with, ‏نحب قهوة بالحليب‎ ― nḥib qahwa b-li-ḥlīb ― I
added to an imperfect (present) verb form to express future tense: will
very, ‏نحبك برشا.‎‎ ― nḥebbek barša. ― I love you a
a lot of; much; many, ‏كليت برشا كسكسي.‎‎ ― klīt barša
a little, a little bit, slightly, to a small extent

(ditransitive) to name, to call, to designate, to denominate
‏شسميت ولدك؟‎‎šsammīt wildik?How did you name your son?
in, ‏تسكن عايلتي في سوسة‎ ― tuskun ʿāyilti fi sūsa
not, ‏آنا مش تونسي.‎‎ʾāna muš tūnsi.I am not Tunisian.
with, together with, in the company of, ‏تحبشي تجي

and
‏حَاجْتِي بْقْلَمْ وكَرّاسَة‎ ― ḥājtī b-qlam u karrāsa ― I need a pencil and a copy-book.
